title: St Bride Library Design Auction
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20100204113241/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 16.Mar.2009 10.40am 

Reminder: the Design Auction is this Thursday, 19 March, at 5.00pm in  
the Bridewell Hall.

Half the proceeds go to St Bride Library, with the remainder helping to fund the end of year degree show of the BA (Hons) Graphic Design degree course at Lincoln School of Art & Design.
author: Miss Tiffany
